articles.title: Kevin Durant: Exchange with Nuggets Nikola Jokic near Suns huddle was 'absolutely nothing' - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Kevin Durant and Bruce Brown received double technical fouls for their role in an exchange around the Suns sideline huddle in Denver's Game 5 win.
articles.content:
